issue.title: [CF 705] TMW doesnt find the buff
issue.body:
Hi!

I'm using TMW version 6.0.4 and I wont get the buff created by "flashfrozen resin globule" (http://www.wowhead.com/item=81263/flashfrozen-resin-globule#comments) tracked correctly since the buff that the trinket creates when its used doesnt exist at all.

The buff is named "Flashfreeze" and gives 4232int for 25 seconds whereas the only trackable buff with TMW named flashfreeze is (126478)
a buff that gives 129int for 25seconds.

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SShowTimerText^B ^SCustomTex^S126478 ^SOnlyMine^B ^SEnabled^B ^t^N60447^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

is the only flashfreeze buff availible to track which is obviously not the correct one


> Posted by CurseForge user pewpewpewcrew | Imported from CurseForge issue #705 | Raw

comments.body:
It seems to me that you didn't actually test anything out before posting this ticket. The buff that you mentioned is indeed the correct one. It is called "Flashfreeze" and it has a spellID of 126478. The tooltip may appear incorrectly because of the way that buffs like this scale with level. That doesn't mean that it is the wrong buff.

If you notice that you gain a buff called "Flashfreeze" when you use this trinket, then typing "Flashfreeze" as the buff to be checked by the TMW icon will cause it to be tracked correctly. What you see is what you get when entering spells into TellMeWhen - there is no hidden data or extra information that is included when you select something from the suggestion list. The suggestion list is just there to make entry of spells easier.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
